column2: I keep finding myself choosing Local Foods over many other Rice Village options. It's got that special "something something"
column3: and is truly a gem of the Village. It's got a nice space
column5: and extremely friendly service. Also perfect for any occasion
column6: whether you've come with a coworker
column8: or by yourself. Best of all
column9: the food is both healthy and yummy at the same time!! That's rare to find these days.
